title: What is the other applicant’s relationship to deceased?
question: What is the other applicant’s relationship to {deceasedName}?
hintText: Based on the information you have given us, there are other people entitled to inherit who you can apply with.
optionGrandchildHintText: This can only be through any of {deceasedName}’s children that died before {deceasedName}

coApplicantRelationshipToDeceased.required: Select what the applicant’s relationship to {deceasedName} is
